title: Russian army breaks through in Ukraine's Donetsk region
subhead: The Russian advance threatens the last two urban areas in the region that Ukraine still controls. The push on the front lines has come at the worst possible time for Kyiv, just three days before the Trump-Putin summit.

title: 'Some health workers faint': A doctor in Gaza shares his story
subhead: Dr. Mohammed Abu Mughaisib, a doctor and deputy medical coordinator for Doctors Without Borders in Gaza, tells Le Monde about the daily life of a medical worker facing overcrowded hospitals, lack of equipment and food shortages.
byline: By Juliette Prigent, Sinead McCausland and Le Monde's video desk

title: German Chancellor Merz forced to justify suspending arms deliveries to Israel after party blacklash
subhead: Amid his party's internal rebellion, the Christian Democratic chancellor was forced to cut short his vacation to explain his decision on public television.

title: Casablanca has become a safe haven for sub-Saharan migrants
subhead: Morocco's economic capital welcomes many immigrants from West Africa. Confronted with growing barriers to reaching Europe, some have chosen to settle in this metropolis, where they are 'tolerated.'

For young underground partiers, Paris is 'a playground in motion'
subhead: 'Why Do We Party?' (5/6). In Paris and its outskirts, clandestine parties are held in discreet locations, gathering a generation of techno fans far removed from established clubs.

title: Streaming's new pirates: 'We're not a big network of cybercriminals, just two high schoolers having fun'
subhead: 'Click To Pirate' (1/5). In the shadow of major piracy giants, smaller platforms proliferate, generally run by young amateurs determined to illegally distribute films and TV series.

title: In Barcelona, certain buses run on biomethane produced from human waste
subhead: For five years, researchers at Veolia − the company responsible for water distribution in Barcelona − have been working to recover sewage sludge in order to produce biomethane, a sustainable fuel that emits 80% less CO2 than natural gas.
